value:
$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|At long last, the wait is over! Bring on
the wintertime celebration!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Try to control yourself, Sharena.$k$p$EFace|Hold a moment. Is that who I think
it is?$k$p$WmMPID_レーヴァテイン,ch00_09_Laevatain_F_Normal,Face_Smile|This must be the winter festival.
The way the land seems to glitter...
It's actually rather lovely.$k$p$WmMPID_レーギャルン,ch00_11_Laegjarn_F_Normal,Face_Smile|It is an enchanting sight, is it not?
I am pleased to be able to experience
it alongside you, Laevatein.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|The Princesses of Múspell?$k$p$EFace_Pain|But Princess Laegjarn, she...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Yes, but it appears these two hail
from a different world than ours.$k$p$WmMPID_レーギャルン,ch00_11_Laegjarn_F_Normal,Face_Smile|All the spoils of victory shall belong
to you today, dear sister.$k$p$WmMPID_レーヴァテイン,ch00_09_Laevatain_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Nonsense, Laegjarn. I insist that
we divide our winnings evenly.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Sisterly love... Oh, I'm getting misty!$k$p$EFace|That's it—I've decided. If I win, I'm
going to share with everyone!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Wonderful. Wait... What was your
original plan, then?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool|Never mind that! Time to get started!$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_冬祭ソティス,ch17_05_Sothis_F_WinterFes19,Face|The customs of other worlds are
strange indeed. Is fantastical garb
such as this truly traditional?$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭ニノ,ch03_03_Nino_F_WinterFes19,Face|Don't be shy, Sothis! The tree look
is wonderful on you. Your green hair
really makes it!$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭ソティス,ch17_05_Sothis_F_WinterFes19,Face|It is unclear to me what is wondrous
about looking like a fern.$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭若ゼフィール,ch03_25_Zefhyr_M_WinterFes19,Face|Shall we table this discussion, for the
moment? Our opposition has arrived.$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭ニノ,ch03_03_Nino_F_WinterFes19,Face|Right! Let's win this thing, so we can
pass out all the gifts!$k$p

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_冬祭若ゼフィール,ch03_25_Zefhyr_M_WinterFes19,Face|It appears we are at a disadvantage.
Let us retreat and regroup, while
we still can.$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭ニノ,ch03_03_Nino_F_WinterFes19,Face|If only Jaffar was with us now...
Ah, well. Let's pull back!$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭ソティス,ch17_05_Sothis_F_WinterFes19,Face|Until we meet again!$k$p$Sbs150|
